Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
11.06.2013 GB SCR18203 Extended test if upper (ARCH_DOCEXTENSION) = MSG or HTM with CSV
17.04.2013 SH SCR16099 BXA038F Added task "CreateErrorSupport"
10.04.2013 SH SCR18076 BXA038B Added test to check Radiant archive only if all files exist in the FL archive (table ARCH)
05.02.2013 AS SCR#17809 added parameter pi.language to GB335
09.01.2013 AS SCR#17809 Converting PDF to version 1.6 before merging into the XML to avoid problems with Tamino
01.05.2012 GB SCR17311 Extended test if upper (ARCH_DOCEXTENSION) = MSG
20.03.2012 GB SCR17175 Added test "If upper (ARCH_DOCEXTENSION) = MSG then do not store a T38D row
because emails cannot be printed on the CRA documents" in the BXA038A
21.02.2011 GB SCR16173 Fixed problem with Record has been changed by another ...
in the Check Archive, CheckRadianttArchive
15.07.2010 GB SCR15651 Added the DeleteT38D If T38D_RADIENT_ERRORCOUNT > 100
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
03.09.2009 SH SCR13914 BXA038D Added V.ENCODING

Text.val: -- Check if it's a restart, then BXA038A has to be skipped
-- BXA038F - Delete TX38 rows
-- Set / reset variables
... only start if it's was not a restart
... only if T38D rows are populated in BXA038A or already exists (because of
a restart)
... if attachemnts (documents) exists and no errors occured in BXA038B, go on to
generate the XML file
... switch to client language, report has to be generated in client language

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BTCP_BTCH_ID, BTCP_LINENO, BTCP_DEBH_NO, BTCP_DEBC_DEBC, BTCP_HYPA_ID, BTCP_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME, BTCP_BADP_ID, BTCP_CHQE_ID, BTCP_DRFT_ID, cast(BTCP_AMOUNTCURRPAYMENT as decimal(13,2)), BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE from :1/btpc, :1/btcp where BTCP_BTCH_ID = BTPC_BTCH_ID and BTCP_LINENO = BTPC_BTCP_LINENO and BTPC_ADMNO = :2 and BTPC_CLNTNO = :3 and BTPC_DATCASHREPORT = ':4' and (BTCP_HYPA_ID > 0 or BTCP_BADP_ID > 0 or BTCP_CHQE_ID > 0 or BTCP_DRFT_ID > 0) order by :5 for fetch only

09.01.2013 AS SCR#17809. Due to problems they cause with Tamino we do convert PDF files with version
1.5 to version 1.6 before we do insert them into the XML. Note that we simply ignore all errors here. If somthing fails
we have information in the job log to investigate and the original file will be used as before
-- If T38D_RADIENT_ERRORCOUNT > 100 then delete the T38D row

ExpSyntax.val: 'UFB558RA was not able to generate and fill base64 encoded image data. (Errorcode = '&Trim (Str ({12,11},'N9'))
